description: Gets a list of summaries of the document classifiers that you have created.

nested_items.name: DocumentClassifierSummariesList
nested_items.description: The list of summaries of document classifiers.

nested_items.name: DocumentClassifierName
nested_items.description: The name that you assigned the document classifier.

nested_items.name: NumberOfVersions
nested_items.description: The number of versions you created.

nested_items.name: LatestVersionCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time that the latest document classifier version was submitted for processing.

nested_items.name: LatestVersionName
nested_items.description: The version name you assigned to the latest document classifier version.

nested_items.name: LatestVersionStatus
nested_items.description: Provides the status of the latest document classifier version.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Identifies the next page of results to return.
